subject: More boxes
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Just some of the junk I work on. Current project is another car tuner, but
it does AM and FM simultaneously, or can be swtiched to AM *or* FM I have
have a tri-clolor LED to indicate band.

 FYI, I don't go "huanted hot spots" to record, that concept is absolutely
bogus.

F-S
